original_title: Sri Lanka Army personnel seen navigating through floodwaters in a WMZ 551B to rescue stranded residents in the Kukuleganga area
original_body_lines: Sri Lanka Army personnel seen navigating through floodwaters in a WMZ 551B to rescue stranded residents in the Kukuleganga area. Both military and police forces are currently engaged in island-wide rescue operations following heavy rains and severe weather conditions.
